content:
What is rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2-tools/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/testsuite-bb2a3783387d4876, when i run this: a lot of tests failed?
What should i do to fix it?

That's the stage 2 test suite. I can't know how to fix it without seeing the errors, but someone yesterday mentioned errors in RLS which might be your issue. Why are you trying to run the full test suite?

Joshua Nelson said:

That's the stage 2 test suite. I can't know how to fix it without seeing the errors, but someone yesterday mentioned errors in RLS which might be your issue. Why are you trying to run the full test suite?

Can rust work well without full testing?

Joshua Nelson said:

That's the stage 2 test suite. I can't know how to fix it without seeing the errors, but someone yesterday mentioned errors in RLS which might be your issue. Why are you trying to run the full test suite?

And When run it, it doesn't show any errors like others. So I'm so cofused.
